content.rendered:
Directed by Kookie Gulati

Written by Arjun Dhawan. Kookie Gulati. Ritesh Shah

Cast Abhishek Bachchan(Hemant Shah). Nikita Dutta(Priya Patel Shah). Ileana D’Cruz(Meera Rao).Sanjeev Pandey. Srestha Banerjee(Mrinali Singh – Senior Journalist). Hitesh Arora(Ankur (Auditor)). Kannan Arunachalam(Venkateshwar). Azzy Bagria(Pankaj Kumar (as Bagria Azzy)). Sorabh Chauhan(Auditor Rajat). Subodh Gulati(Questioner). Sanjeev Jogtiyani(Priya’s Father). Rio Kapadia(NCC MD Singh). Ram Kapoor(Ashok Mirchandani). Aryan Khanna(Investor). Richard Bhakti Klein(International News Anchor (as R. Bhakti Klein)). Durgesh Kumar(Lift man). Akash Mahamana(Raju). Mahesh Manjrekar(Rana Sawant). Shamu Akhtariya Moulik(Borivali ka brushli). Sanjay Paraswani(Broker). Supriya Pathak(Amiben (Hemant’s Mother)). Lekha Prajapati(Tara (as Lekha Prajapati)). Vijay Rajoria(Raman (as Vijay Kumar Rajoria)). Hiren Rathod(Sudeep). Hitesh Rawal(Kantilal). Sohum Shah(Viren Shah). Tripti Shankhdhar(Ashima). Girish Sharma(Atul Sabharwal , Assistant Commissioner Income Tax). Sanjay Sharma(Pranay Oberoi). Shishir Sharma(Rajesh MishraChief Editor (Times Of India)). Saurabh Shukla(Mannu Malpani). Chobber Sidhu(Ramchi Bhau). Samir Soni(Sanjeev Kohli). Rohit Tiwari(CBI Officer Rakesh). Aeklavya Tomer(Teja). Akhil Vaid(Vikram Solanki). Sumit Vats(Hari). Pankaj Vishnu(CBI Officer Dheeraj). Sultan Warsi(Landlord)

Language Hindi

Producers Ajay Devgn. Ravindra Mankame. Aish Pandit. Anand Pandit. Sanjay Paraswani. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Vikrant Sharma. Sahil Singh.

Production Ajay Devgn Films. Anand Pandit Motion Pictures
